lead_paragraph: Warm and wet weather conditions may alter plans for the 2017 NHL Winter Classic between the Chicago Blackhawks and the Blues outdoors at Busch Stadium in St. Louis on Monday.
snippet: Warm and wet weather conditions may alter plans for the 2017 NHL Winter Classic between the Chicago Blackhawks and the Blues outdoors at Busch Stadium in St. Louis on Monday....

headline.main: Warm, Wet Weather Could Delay Winter Classic
headline.print_headline: Warm, Wet Weather Could Delay Winter Classic
